name: Shape Snack
description:
Welcome to the Formia Outer Space Research facility 

where we are pioneering shape shifting technology.

your a cube, but eat a pyramid and now you are a pyramid 

solve various puzzles and make science proud .

[This Game Is In Beta: there are many bugs]

Full OST  (https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiGUbr2kZgaEIEGtumsMlbwoH6EtNUwBE)

This game was made for the first Dani's Basement Game Jam by my team RePlay Studios.

Airscrach(Me): Lead Dev.

Archgalaxy: Lead Music Designer (You Nailed it).

Luna: Minor texture help.

Free Model: https://poly.google.com/view/eUqkKNWc2jK
